p: There are a lot of discrepancies regarding the taxonomy of the subgenus Perovskia. According to primary classification based on flower morphology, species belonging to Perovskia together with four other genera, Dorystaechas, Meriandra, Rosmarinus, and Zhumeria, have previously been considered closely related to Salvia and were treated together as part of the subtribe Salviinae in the most recent and comprehensive conspectus of Lamiaceae [ 10].
